features: Multiple nipple holes and innovative, extra-soft nipple provide a natural feed-it feels just like mom's breast
4 oz bottle comes with slow-flow nipple that has 3 holes to provide baby's most comfortable feed
Advanced 1-piece anti-colic Air System helps reduce colic, gas, and spit up for greater comfort and fewer messes
Flexible nipple allows for a continuous latch and is the same shape as mom's nursing nipple during breastfeeding
Accepted by 96% of babies - Based on 2019 independent market research amongst 203 mothers in Germany
body.description: Now your baby can transition from breast to bottle in a natural way with NUK Simply Natural glass bottles. Designed to mimic the fit, flow, and movement of mom as closely as possible, This is the only bottle with up to nine nipple holes, just like mom. This provides a natural feeding experience to ensure the mom-baby bond remains strong. Our bottles feature an even softer nipple than before. NUK Simply Natural nipples mimic the shape mom's breast takes while breastfeeding. The scooped nipple cavity allows space for baby's tongue and jaw to move naturally, just like they do when breastfeeding.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NUK Simply Natural Glass Bottles, 4 Oz, 3 Pack Now your baby can transition from breast to bottle in a natural way with NUK Simply Natural glass bottles. Designed to mimic the fit, flow, and movement of mom as closely as possible, this is the only bottle with up to nine nipple holes, just like mom. This provides a natural feeding experience to ensure the mom-baby bond remains strong. Our bottles feature an even softer nipple than before. NUK Simply Natural nipples mimic the shape mom's breast takes while breastfeeding. The scooped nipple cavity allows space for baby's tongue and jaw to move naturally, just like they do when breastfeeding.

Product Highlights Multiple nipple holes and innovative, extra-soft nipple provide a natural feed—it feels just like mom’s breast4 oz bottle comes with slow-flow nipple that has 3 holes to provide baby's most comfortable feedAdvanced 1-Piece Anti-Colic Air system helps reduce colic, gas, and spit up for greater comfort and fewer messesFlexible nipple allows for a continuous latch and is the same shape as mom’s nursing nipple during breastfeedingGlass bottle is easy to clean, BPA-free and dishwasher-safeContains three 4-oz glass bottles with slow-flow nipples

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We nurse and give pumped bottles when I’m at work. This was the only bottle I purchased (baby #3) and thankfully she has always taken it! They are easy to clean. I run them through the dishwasher and they are still good as new. I would purchase again and recommend these bottles to friends. My other 2 babies used Nuk bottles but I prefer these and appreciate that they have a glass option

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These bottles changed my outlook
reviews.reviewText: I used to be a plastic bottle fan but I got tired of them staining or growing mold in them if I forget them in a diaper bag for a day... these bottles are amazing. My son likes to throw his bottle when he's done with it, like he's Thor, and it's very durable... good weight. I like the look of it. No leakage unless the lid isn't on right. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For a new granddaughter
reviews.reviewText: These haven’t been used yet, but I really like the idea of glass for an infant. It is much easier to clean and sterilize. I am very happy to have found these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Quality bottles! Glass is nice and thick and my baby really loves these bottles. Although I do think these are so expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A durable, well-finished set of glass bottles
reviews.reviewText: We've introduced bottles to our almost 1-month old and they are splendid. They don't fit the Spectra pump we use but that's no problem. We save milk in silicone bags and pour off a meal's worth each time. The bottle goes into a Phillips warmer and gets nice and toasty.I like glass, to hold and to clean. With few parts, these are quickly hand-washed and set to dry. Every part seems to be well-constructed; I noticed the Made in Germany stamp on the nipple. Speaking of which, they are indeed slow flow. No major gas problems have resulted from feeding and the baby doesn't have bottle preference over the breast. With these, you get what you pay for in spades.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars LO didn't like the nipples
reviews.reviewText: Our LO didn't care for the nipples and they seemed to make her more gassy. The bottles were easy to clean and we loved the fact they were glass. Overall a good product, our girl just didn't care for them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted my infant to become familiar with the bottle, for the occasion that I was not able to nurse her. These are wonderful bottles, they hold the perfect amount of milk, and the glass is very strong. I highly recommend purchasing this product if you are looking for a high quality bottle. Enjoy ☺️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breastfed baby likes it!
reviews.reviewText: My exclusively breastfed, nine-week-old baby was having trouble with the Medela bottles. The nipples are too long. This bottle has a shallower, flatter nipple, which more resembles Mom's. My baby had far less trouble adjusting to this nipple. I highly recommend for babies who have only been fed from Mom's breast who want to transition to a bottle.
Amee! La mamila es de lo mejor, amee estos biberones y mi bebe los acepto muy bien
